title: AI-Powered RFP Generator
description: Automatically creates compliant RFP responses in 60 minutes or less with our Wizard of Hahz rush service

title: Upvote Scoring
description: We replaced the confusing traditional RFP scoring system with a simple product hunt style upvote format to score RFPs.

title: 1-Hour Rush Service
description: Emergency RFP response with complete marketing plan delivered in just 60 minutes

title: Marketing Plan Wizard
description: AI-generated, data-driven marketing strategies included with every proposal

title: Real-Time Collaboration
description: Simultaneous multi-user editing with version control for team proposals

title: Proposal Analytics
description: Track win rates, response times, and scoring patterns across all submissions

title: Compliance Auto-Check
description: Automatically verifies proposal meets all RFP requirements before submission

title: RFP Workspaces
description: Launch a branded workspace for each RFP. Centralize all talk, files, and stakeholder updates in one place.

title: Blockchain Audit Trail
description: Immutable record of all proposal changes, submissions, and scoring decisions

title: Competitive Intelligence
description: AI analysis of competing bids and historical RFP outcomes guided by RFP experts

title: Smart Contract Payments
description: Secure, automatic payments upon successful RFP wins

title: Mobile Proposal Management
description: Create, edit and submit RFPs from anywhere with from your mobile device in a social media style app

title: AI Content Optimization
description: Real-time writing suggestions to improve proposal quality and scores

title: Monthly analytics
description: Receive monthly analytics on your RFP project activity delivered via email

title: Earn RFP credits
description: Redeem your RFP credits from social media activity for AI RFP services or for boosting your RFP
